objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Historical lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about technology in daily life using informal register
Students create original historical themed content about technology in daily life in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Historical story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using informal register in historical context
Character B: Responding in informal register within historical theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with tradition
technology in daily life with heritage
technology in daily life with legacy

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
